name: Between (Jonrador)
description:
This game was made for Louisiana Tech's 48 Game Jam 2018. Everything including in this game was made from scratch in just 48 hours. In this game you switch between two worlds of life and death in an attempt to solve short puzzles and advance through the level.

--CREDITS--

Design, Programming, Additional Art

John Wolz

Art, Additional Design

Sophie Bott

Runners

Kenzie Cude, Zach O'Rear
